trans-unit.source: Provides methods for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: Biedt methoden voor het maken van meervoud en enkelvoud vormen van woorden.

trans-unit.source: The PluralizationService class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: De klasse PluralizationService past Engelse regels voor het maken van meervoud en enkelvoud vormen van woorden.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt uitbreiden van de service voor andere talen, gebruiken de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>op de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>klasse.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> that applies language rules that correspond to the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Maakt een <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> die van toepassing is taalregels die overeenkomen met de opgegeven <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>klasse past Engelse regels voor het maken van meervoud en enkelvoud vormen van woorden.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt uitbreiden van de service voor andere talen, gebruiken de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>op de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>klasse.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that corresponds to the language rules applied for singular and plural forms of words.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>die overeenkomt met de taalregels worden toegepast op enkelvoud en het meervoud vormen van woorden.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Het zojuist gemaakte <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> culture.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld de <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> cultuur.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>klasse past Engelse regels voor het maken van meervoud en enkelvoud vormen van woorden.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt uitbreiden van de service voor andere talen, gebruiken de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>op de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>klasse.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies which language rules to apply for singulars and plurals.
trans-unit.target: Een object dat aangeeft welke taal toe te passen voor singulars en meervouden regels.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is plural.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt bepaald of het opgegeven woord meervoud.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>klasse past Engelse regels voor het maken van meervoud en enkelvoud vormen van woorden.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt uitbreiden van de service voor andere talen, gebruiken de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>op de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>klasse.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Zowel de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>en <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>methoden kunnen terugkeren `true` voor hetzelfde woord.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Bijvoorbeeld: beide methoden wordt geretourneerd `true` voor het woord 'vis'.

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: De waarde moet worden geanalyseerd.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is plural; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als het woord meervoud; anders <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is singular.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt bepaald of het opgegeven woord enkelvoud.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>klasse past Engelse regels voor het maken van meervoud en enkelvoud vormen van woorden.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt uitbreiden van de service voor andere talen, gebruiken de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>op de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>klasse.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Zowel de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>en <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>methoden kunnen terugkeren `true` voor hetzelfde woord.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Bijvoorbeeld: beide methoden wordt geretourneerd `true` voor het woord 'vis'.

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: De waarde moet worden geanalyseerd.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is singular; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als het woord enkelvoud; anders <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the plural form of the specified word
trans-unit.target: Retourneert de meervoud van het opgegeven woord

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>klasse past Engelse regels voor het maken van meervoud en enkelvoud vormen van woorden.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt uitbreiden van de service voor andere talen, gebruiken de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>op de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>klasse.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: The word to be made plural.
trans-unit.target: Het woord moet plaatsvinden meervoud.

trans-unit.source: The plural form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: De meervoud van de invoerparameter.

trans-unit.source: Returns the singular form of the specified word.
trans-unit.target: Retourneert het enkelvoud van het opgegeven woord.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>klasse past Engelse regels voor het maken van meervoud en enkelvoud vormen van woorden.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt uitbreiden van de service voor andere talen, gebruiken de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>op de <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>klasse.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: The word to be made singular.
trans-unit.target: Het woord moet plaatsvinden enkelvoud.

trans-unit.source: The singular form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: De enige vorm van de invoerparameter.
